details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.2 Logical structure - 8.2.5.14 Footnotes and Endnotes (FENote) - NoteType
details.description: The value of the NoteType attribute of the FENote structure element shall be Footnote, Endnote or None

rule.description: The value of the NoteType attribute of the FENote structure element shall be Footnote, Endnote or None

error.message: NoteType attribute of the FENote structure element has value %1 instead of Footnote, Endnote or None
